job_tasks.phrase: drive the design and implementation of Pega-based solutions
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand the business context and translate it into technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Translating business requirements into scalable and robust Pega-based solutions
job_tasks.justification: Directly relates to understanding business needs and converting them into technical specifications.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements, ensuring alignment with project objectives
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the importance of interacting with stakeholders to define requirements and align them with business goals.

job_tasks.phrase: lead and collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders and developers, to deliver state-of-the-art systems
job_tasks.justification: Implies involvement in the delivery of systems, which requires software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Leading end-to-end Pega project implementations, including solution design, system configuration, and integration
job_tasks.justification: Encompasses the full lifecycle of project delivery, including design, configuration, and integration, which are software development activities.

job_tasks.phrase: conducting thorough system testing, identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability
job_tasks.justification: System testing and issue resolution are core components of software development for ensuring quality.
The title explicitly mentions DevOps, indicating a focus on operational aspects of software development and deployment.

soft_skills.phrase: collaborate closely with cross-functional teams, including business stakeholders and developers
Collaborating with stakeholders to gather functional and technical requirements
identifying and resolving issues to ensure optimal performance and reliability
fostering a culture of innovation, and promoting professional growth
bringing innovative ideas to the table
Mentoring and guiding (a) team(s) of skilled Pega developers
Stay abreast of industry trends, emerging technologies

classification.rationale: This job description focuses on Pega platform development and DevOps, not on generative AI or predictive modeling. The core responsibilities and technologies mentioned do not align with the definitions of ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer.
